Bibliographic References: Greco Pontrandolfo, Dial, di Arch. n.s. 1, 1979/2, p. 38, fig. 10 (whole tomb group).
Imagery Description: Nude satyr with thyrsus, egg and phiale of eggs + fillet bending forward over 1. foot raised on tendril in front of stele.
Additional Notes: Found with the chous 21191 (no. 764), which it closely resembles in style.
Artist: Minor Vases from the AsteasNon SepcifiedPython Workshop
